message.content:
Research how FireCut implements invite/referral codes for users. Search the web for:
1. How FireCut's referral system works
2. What benefits referrers and referees get
3. How invite codes are generated and validated
4. Any public documentation or user experiences with FireCut referrals

Then outline how SPLICE could implement a similar system with:
- Code generation (unique per user)
- Code validation endpoint
- Discount application
- Referral tracking in database

input.query: FireCut Premiere Pro plugin referral code invite system
FireCut discount code referral program benefits 2024 2025

Links: [{"title":"FAQ | FireCut","url":"https://learn.firecut.ai/overview-premiere-pro/faq"},{"title":"FireCut","url":"https://firecut.ai/get_started/"},{"title":"FireCut AI for Premiere Pro - Your Fast Ai Video Editing Assistant — Premiere Gal","url":"https://premieregal.com/blog/2024/1/5/firecut-ai-for-premiere-pro-unmasking-the-editing-magic"},{"title":"FireCut - Your Lightning-Fast AI Video Editor","url":"https://firecut.ai/downloads/"},{"title":"FireCut - AI Adobe Premiere Pro Plugin - Easy With AI","url":"https://easywithai.com/ai-video-tools/firecut/"},{"title":"Installing FireCut | FireCut","url":"https://learn.firecut.ai/overview-premiere-pro/installing-firecut"},{"title":"Future Tools - FireCut","url":"https://www.futuretools.io/tools/firecut"},{"title":"FireCut | Adobe Video Partner Program","url":"https://www.adobevideopartner.com/partners/firecut/"},{"title":"Getting started | FireCut","url":"https://learn.firecut.ai/overview-premiere-pro/getting-started"},{"title":"Using FireCut | FireCut","url":"https://learn.firecut.ai/overview-premiere-pro/using-firecut"}]

Based on the search results, here's what I found about the FireCut Premiere Pro plugin referral code invite system:

## FireCut Referral System

You will get an email when you become eligible for the referral program (typically after your first payment has been made), and you will be able to click the "Refer a friend" button in your dashboard.

## Referral Codes at Sign-Up

When signing up for FireCut, there is an option for users who have "Got a referral code from a friend."

## About FireCut

FireCut is an AI video editing plugin for Adobe Premiere Pro that can remove silences, detect chapters, eliminate repetition, edit multi-track videos, and more. It can speed up editing workflows by saving the time it takes to clean up footage and edit multi-track videos like podcasts.(no content)FireCut requires Adobe Premiere Pro 2022+ and works on Windows and Mac.

## Additional Discount Codes

FireCut offers a 14-day free trial and discount codes are available through partners, such as a 10% discount with code 'GAL' from Premiere Gal.

The referral system appears to work as follows:
1. After making your first payment, you become eligible for the referral program
2. You receive an email notification about your eligibility
3. You can then access the "Refer a friend" button from your FireCut dashboard to generate referral codes
4. New users can enter referral codes during the sign-up process


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Based on my search results, here's what I found about FireCut discount codes, referral program, and benefits for 2024-2025:

## FireCut Discount Codes (2024-2025)

FireCut has issued 11 working codes in the past year, and offers an average of 1 coupon code each month.(no content)The best discount (65% off) was offered in April 2025.

### Popular Promo Codes:
- 'MNV10' - 10% OFF
- 'ASHAR10' - 10% OFF
- 'GAL' - 10% OFF
- 'BOGO50' - 50% OFF
- 'PETAR' - 10% OFF
- 'EDITINGCORP' - 10% OFF
- 'ETHAN' - 10% OFF
- 'ENGER' - 10% OFF(no content)Shoppers save an average of 10.0% on purchases with coupons at firecut.ai, with the biggest discount being 20% off.

## Referral Program

FireCut offers a referral code program for sharing with other people. You will get an email when you become eligible for this program (typically after your first payment has been made).(no content)You can then click the "Refer a friend" button in your dashboard.(no content)The FireCut sign-up page includes an option for users who have a referral code from a friend.

## Product & Pricing Information

FireCut is an intuitive AI video editor that simplifies and accelerates the video editing process. Optimized for Adobe Premiere Pro 2022 or later, it offers a 14-day free trial.(no content)The Starter plan is priced at $19 a month or $11 monthly with the annual option.(no content)The Pro plan costs $34 a month, or $24 monthly on the annual plan, and unlocks advanced AI features.(no content)There's also a Lifetime option that provides perpetual access to all features with a one-time payment, though it requires direct contact to set up.(no content)Over 7 customers have already used coupons to save an average of $57 with FireCut discount codes.

input.prompt: Find information about the referral program, referral codes, how referrals work, what benefits referrers and referees get, and any details about how codes are generated or validated
Find information about referral codes, discount codes, how users can enter referral codes during signup, and any referral program details

content.content:
# FireCut Referral Code Information

Based on the webpage content, here's what I found about referral codes:

## Referral Code Entry During Signup

FireCut includes a referral code field in their signup process. The page contains two instances of the prompt: **"Got a referral code from a friend?"** followed by a referral code input field.

## How It Works

The signup form captures referral information through two separate referral code inputs (`referral_code_1` and `referral_code_2`). When users sign up via Google login, these referral codes are automatically included in the redirect URL and transmitted to the system.

## Program Details

The webpage itself doesn't provide extensive details about the referral program's structure, rewards, or mechanics. However, FireCut does maintain a dedicated **[Affiliates page](https://firecut.ai/pages/affiliate)** that likely contains comprehensive information about their affiliate and referral offerings.

**Recommendation:** For complete referral program details, incentives, and terms, visit their Affiliates page or contact their support team at support@firecut.ai.

content.content:
# FireCut Referral Program Information

Based on the FAQ page, here's what I found about FireCut's referral offerings:

## Referral Code Program
FireCut offers a referral code system for sharing with friends and family. According to the documentation: "You will get an email when you become eligible for this program (typically after your first payment has been made), and you will be able to click the 'Refer a friend' button in your dashboard."

Eligibility typically begins after making an initial payment, at which point users can access referral codes through their dashboard.

## Affiliate Program
For those wanting to share FireCut with a broader audience, there's a separate affiliate partnership option. The FAQ states: "You can join our affiliate program through this link https://firecut.ai/pages/affiliate/apply"

This program is designed for content creators and influencers wanting to promote the product to their audiences.

## Key Takeaway
The page distinguishes between two partnership models: a casual referral code system for personal networks and a formal affiliate program for larger-scale promotion. Specific details about commission rates, benefits, or code generation mechanics aren't detailed on this FAQ page.

input.prompt: Find all details about the affiliate and referral program including commission rates, how much referrers earn, what discounts referees get, how codes work, payout structure

input.query: FireCut affiliate program commission referral earnings percentage

content.content:
# FireCut Affiliate Program Overview

Based on the webpage content, here's what I found about FireCut's affiliate program:

## Program Basics
FireCut operates an affiliate program where partners can "earn **lifetime commission** on every referral." The program invites creators and affiliates to join by visiting their affiliate application page.

## How It Works
The program follows a three-step process:
1. **Join the program** through their application
2. **Share your link and discount code** with your audience
3. **Earn lifetime commission** from referred customers

## Key Features
- **Lifetime commissions**: Unlike typical programs with limited commission periods, FireCut offers ongoing payouts for referred customers
- **Target audience**: The program specifically appeals to video creators and editors who can recommend the tool to their communities
- **Multiple promotion channels**: While video content is mentioned, they also accept affiliates using newsletters, blogs, and other audience reach methods

## Support Materials
FireCut provides brand assets and promotional resources to help affiliates share the product effectively with their audiences.

**Note**: The specific commission rates, discount amounts, and payout schedules are referenced as FAQ items on the page but the detailed answers aren't visible in the provided content.

Based on my search, I was unable to find specific information about the FireCut affiliate program commission or referral earnings percentage. The search results returned general information about affiliate marketing commission structures and various other affiliate programs, but nothing specifically about FireCut.

Here's what I found regarding general affiliate commission information:

**General Affiliate Commission Rates:**
- Percentage commissions are the most popular type of affiliate commission, with the average rate ranging between 5% and 30%.
- You can earn commendable commission rates in industries like SaaS or finance which pay between 20% to 30% for every conversion.
- Most DTC brands start affiliates at 10–15% per sale or a flat $10–$15 for new-customer orders, then tier up for top partners.

**Common Commission Models:**
- Flat commissions pay a fixed amount per conversion, providing predictable costs and simple calculations. Tiered commissions increase payouts based on performance levels, encouraging affiliates to drive more sales. Percentage-based commissions tie earnings directly to sale value, naturally scaling with your revenue. Recurring commissions continue paying affiliates as long as customers remain subscribed, perfect for subscription businesses.

If you're looking for specific information about FireCut's affiliate program, I would recommend:
1. Visiting FireCut's official website directly
2. Looking for an "Affiliates" or "Partner Program" page
3. Contacting FireCut's support team for details on their referral commission structure

input.prompt: Find the application form details, what information is needed to become an affiliate, and any terms about commission rates or referral benefits

content.content:
# FireCut Affiliate Program Overview

## Application Form

The affiliate application form collects the following information:

- **Name** (required)
- **Email** (required)
- **Country** (required)
- **Business name** (required)
- **Preferred referral code** (max 8 characters, required)
- **Primary audience reach method** (required) - options include YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Newsletter, Blog, or Other
- **Audience size** (required)
- **Optional fields**: Website URL, YouTube URL, Instagram URL, TikTok URL, and additional comments

## Commission Structure

The page prominently advertises "lifetime commission on every referral," though specific commission rates or detailed terms are not provided in the visible content.

## Access

Existing affiliates can log in through the provided dashboard link, while new applicants submit the form to apply for membership in the program.
